bucketColumns.description: List of reducer grouping columns, clustering columns, and bucketing columns in the table.

columns.description: Configuration block for columns in the table. See `columns` below.

compressed.description: Whether the data in the table is compressed.

inputFormat.description: Input format: SequenceFileInputFormat (binary), or TextInputFormat, or a custom format.

location.description: Physical location of the table. By default, this takes the form of the warehouse location, followed by the database location in the warehouse, followed by the table name.

numberOfBuckets.description: Is if the table contains any dimension columns.

outputFormat.description: Output format: SequenceFileOutputFormat (binary), or IgnoreKeyTextOutputFormat, or a custom format.

parameters.description: Map of initialization parameters for the SerDe, in key-value form.

schemaReferences.description: Object that references a schema stored in the AWS Glue Schema Registry. See `schema_reference` below.

serDeInfos.description: Configuration block for serialization and deserialization ("SerDe") information. See `ser_de_info` below.

skewedInfos.description: Configuration block with information about values that appear very frequently in a column (skewed values). See `skewed_info` below.

sortColumns.description: Configuration block for the sort order of each bucket in the table. See `sort_columns` below.

storedAsSubDirectories.description: Whether the table data is stored in subdirectories.
